abstract: Rival bidders may be looking to derail BHP Billiton’s $39 billion bid for Potash, with Sinochem of China and a Canadian pension fund working on plans, according to newspaper reports.
snippet: Rival bidders may be looking to derail BHP Billiton’s $39 billion bid for Potash, with Sinochem of China and a Canadian pension fund working on plans, according to newspaper reports.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton‘s $39 billion bid for the Potash Corporation may be threatened by rival bids, Reuters says, with Sinochem of China and a Canadian pension fund working on plans.

headline.main: Rivals Scramble to Derail BHP’s Potash Plans
